# morpheus_job (Data Source)

Provides a Morpheus job data source.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "morpheus_job" "example_job" {
  name = "TF Example job"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) The ID of the job
- `name` (String) The name of the job
